description: This is a source code file for a Flutter app, implementing the MatchesScreen widget which displays a list of profile matches with filtering options, including filter chips for active filters and a grid of profile cards.

classes.name: _ActiveFilterChips
classes.description: A widget displaying active filter chips and reset/clear options.

classes.name: _DeletableChip
classes.description: A widget representing a filter chip with a delete button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MatchesScreen, including the app bar, filter chips, profiles grid, and floating action button.

methods.name: _enumLabel
methods.description: Converts enum names into human-friendly labels.
